code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert('Inicio de sesión exitoso');onLogin(email);navigate('/perfil');};const handleBackClick=()=>{navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Iniciar Sesi\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"w-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Correo Electr\xF3nico:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"login-form-control",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Contrase\xF1a:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"login-form-control",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form-group d-grid gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Iniciar Sesi\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:handleBackClick,children:"Atr\xE1s"})]})]})]});}export default Login;
